  • Method Details

    • canSwitchLanguage

      public static boolean canSwitchLanguage()
      Returns:
      returns true if the current user is allowed to switch to a different language

    • canSwitchLocale

      public static boolean canSwitchLocale()
      Returns:
      returns true if the current user is allowed to switch to a different locale

    • getAllLanguages

      public static List<LanguageType> getAllLanguages()
      Returns:
      a list of all available languages

    • getAllLocales

      public static List<LocaleType> getAllLocales()
      Returns:
      a list of all available locales

    • getLanguageLabel

      public static String getLanguageLabel(LanguageType language)
      Returns the display label for the language
      Parameters:
      language - language
      Returns:
      localized string of language's display label

    • getLocaleLabel

      public static String getLocaleLabel(LocaleType locale)

    • getCurrentLanguageType

      public static LanguageType getCurrentLanguageType()
      Returns:
      The typecode for the current language for this thread, which will be, in order: 1) the temporary language setting, such as when the current language is set in runAsCurrentLanguage(), or 2) the user's default language (if not null), or 3) the system default language.

    • getCurrentLocaleType

      public static LocaleType getCurrentLocaleType()
      Returns:
      The typecode for the current locale for this thread, which will be, in order: 1) the temporary locale setting, such as when the current locale is set in runAsCurrentLocale(), or 2) the user's default locale (if not null), or 3) the system default locale.

    • getCurrentLanguageLabel

      public static String getCurrentLanguageLabel()
      Returns display label of the current language, which may be based on user language setting or the browser setting.
      Returns:
      localized string

    • getCurrentUserLanguage

      public static LanguageType getCurrentUserLanguage()
      Returns:
      The current user's LanguageType from User.Language, which may be null. You may want to use getCurrentLanguageType() instead, which returns the current language used on the thread.

    • getComparator

      public static Comparator getComparator()
      Returns:
      the String comparator for the current language

    • getCurrentUserLocale

      public static LocaleType getCurrentUserLocale()
      Returns:
      The current user's LocaleType from User.Locale, which may be null. You may want to use getCurrentLocaleType() instead, which returns the current locale used on the thread.

    • getDefaultLocale

      public static ILocale getDefaultLocale()
      Returns:
      the application's default locale

    • getDefaultLanguage

      public static ILocale getDefaultLanguage()
      Returns:
      the application's default language

    • getDefaultLanguageType

      public static LanguageType getDefaultLanguageType()
      Returns:
      the application's default language type

    • getDefaultLocaleType

      public static LocaleType getDefaultLocaleType()
      Returns:
      the application's default locale type

    • getDefaultCountry

      public static Country getDefaultCountry()
      Returns:
      the application's default country

    • getUserDefaultCountry

      public static Country getUserDefaultCountry()
      Returns:
      the user's default country. Will fall back to server default country if user default country is null

    • runAsCurrentLocale

      public static void runAsCurrentLocale(ILocale locale, GWRunnable runnable) throws Exception
      run the block in the context of the given locale
      Parameters:

      runnable - code block
      Throws:

    • compareValues

      public static int compareValues(Object compareValue1, Object compareValue2)
      Compare two values taking into account the current locale's SortCollation setting.
      Parameters:
      compareValue1 - first value
      compareValue2 - second value
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if compareValue1 is less than, equal to, or greater than compareValue2.

    • getLocalizedName

      public static String getLocalizedName(IType type)

    • getLocalizedName

      public static String getLocalizedName(String typeName)

    • getCurrentLocale

      public static IGWLocale getCurrentLocale()
      Returns:
      The current locale for this thread, which will be, in order: 1) the temporary locale setting, such as when the current locale is set in runAsCurrentLocale(), or 2) the user's default locale (if not null), or 3) the system default locale.

    • getCurrentLanguage

      public static IGWLanguage getCurrentLanguage()
      Returns:
      The current language for this thread, which will be, in order: 1) the temporary language setting, such as when the current language is set in runAsCurrentLanguage(), or 2) the user's default language (if not null), or 3) the system default language.
